title: MD
biography: Al Naft Sports Club is an Iraqi professional sports club based in the Adhamiyah District, East Districts of the Tigris River, Baghdad. Their football team plays in the highest division in Iraq which is the Iraq Stars League, which they have never been relegated from.
aiSummary: Majid Al Fayyadh is a saudi health excellence awards specialist with an H-index of 25 at KFSHRCHospital Administration (Member). Has been published in Environmental science and pollution research international. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
